skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a time-lapse shot of a massive storm cloud forming and moving over a desert landscape. The cloud begins as a large white formation and gradually expands and darkens, eventually covering the entire sky. The scene captures the dramatic and rapid development of a storm in an arid environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video is a time-lapse shot of a massive storm cloud forming and moving over a desert landscape. The cloud begins as a large white formation and gradually expands and darkens, eventually covering the entire sky. The scene captures the dramatic and rapid development of a storm in an arid environment.
